page.title: 14A Doncaster Miners' Day.
page.content: A day in the life of a worker at Hatfield Colliery who lives in the Block area. {5.40am}Got up and went to work. {6.00am}Arrived at Colliery and reported to foreman. {6.15am}Went down the mine to measure the air quantity. Took some air samples from Gallagher's Drift. Went to 23's diesel haulage and took further measurements and samples in High Hazel seam. {8.00 approx}Took some samples in 19's intake as return airways have to be analysed regularly. {12.00}I came out of work to do the books. {1.30pm}Arrived home, had a cup of tea and some cake. Then did some gardening till tea at{4.00pm.}Watched T.V. in the evening, and went to bed at{11.00. {5.40am next day}Got up to go to work.
